body:
Comment 6: 
of the template ones listed, it's fine to include them all but only 9649:a163a464ef59 is
worth the trouble, and only barely. i'd ignore the rest

the deadlock one is an error state anyway
ranging over channel is a new feature and i doubt anyone will use it any time soon
a trivial typo in a doc is never worth backporting
the exported state of inner nodes no client uses is irrelevant

so why the burning need?
